title: string "+=" operation is unbelievable slow
body:
by **ZouZhensheng**: 
http://play.golang.org/p/3s0mN61I-K

when repeating string "+="operation for 1,000,000 times, on my machine (mac
osx) it took several minutes to finish, while the python version just took less than a
second!



Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
gccgo

Which operating system are you using?
mac osx

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go 1.1.2

Please provide any additional information below.
